Articles.Content:
This plane is a pretty advanced jet. It can take off vertically and hover and land vertically. It is also highly maneuverable and weapons could be mounted on the wings. Here is a diagram of it. Credit to the current developer of Kronal Vessel Viewer for making that mod that helped me make this awesome diagram of the plane.

Image unavailable atm as i just realized it had my real name on there... im stupid... But it is a great plane i assure you.

Here is the links to the .craft file

Modded (requires Bahamuto Dynamics part pack)

http://www./view/xe87rqx1x3ulzoq/F-431_vtol.craft

Fullstock

http://www./view/aooh2dbhm80hslg/F-431_vtol_(STOCK).craft

Action groups:

1 to toggle hover

2 to toggle

Edited September 30, 2014 by trogdor10
Image had my real name in it

Ill take a screen shot for ya of it in a sec.

Edit:

Love the look of it man, aesthetically pleasing and all that, love the handling of it too, very unique with all the reaction wheels up the front, almost feels out of control but you still have complete control, awesomely fun to fly, good job

Edited September 30, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

thanks! I was very proud of it myself. I wanted to combine the look of a harrier with an F-22. As for the reaction wheel in the front, its something ive always done and i am not sure why i do it, it just feels awesome

Edited September 30, 2014 by trogdor10

Did you read the OP? here i will quote it for you.

Image unavailable atm as i just realized it had my real name on there... im stupid...
